sen.j: 紫明通（しめいどおり）は京都市北区 (京都市)南部の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Shimei-dori Street is one of the east and west street at north part of Kita-Ward, Kyoto City.
Shimei-dori Street is a street running east-west through the north part of Kita-Ward, Kyoto City.
Shimei-dori Street is a street running east-west through the north part of Kita Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 加茂街道から西やや南へ向い、南に曲がって堀川通に接続する。
sen.e: It runs to west and slightly toward to north from Kamo kaido and turned to south and connects to Horikawa-dori Street.
It runs west and slightly toward the north from Kamo kaido and turns south to connect to Horikawa-dori Street.
It runs west and slightly toward the north from Kamo kaido and turns south to connect to Horikawa-dori Street.

sen.j: 延長が短いため交通量は少ない。
sen.e: There is little traffic because the extension is short.
There is little traffic because of the short extension.
There is little traffic because of the short extension.

sen.j: もともとは、蹴上から松ヶ崎、下鴨を経て、賀茂川をサイフォンでくぐり、堀川へ抜ける琵琶湖疏水分線の経路の一部であったが、現在水路は埋め立てられている。
sen.e: Originally it was a part of route of Lake-Biwa-Canal which goes through to Horikawa from Keage to Matsugasaki and via Shimogamo, and under through Kamo River with siphon, but a canal is filled now.
Originally it was a part of a route for the Lake-Biwa-Canal, now filled, which went through Horikawa from Keage to Matsugasaki via Shimogamo, and under Kamo River using a siphon.
Originally it was a part of a route for the Lake Biwa Canal, now filled, which went through Horikawa from Keage to Matsugasaki via Shimogamo, and under the Kamo-gawa River using a siphon.
sen.cmt: Kamo-gawa Riverとし、Lake-Biwa-Canalのハイフンをはずしました。"Kamo-gawa"→"the Kamo-gaw"に変更しました。

sen.j: 第二次世界大戦中の防火帯設置のための強制疎開により、堀川通や五条通と同様に道幅は広い。
sen.e: The width of street is wide such as Horikawa-dori Street and Gojo-dori Street by forced evacuation for install of a firebreak in World War II.
Like Horikawa-dori and Gojo-dori Street, its width is wide due to firefighting facilities which were installed to support forced evacuation during World War II.
Like Horikawa-dori and Gojo-dori Street, its width is wide due to firefighting facilities which were installed to support forced evacuation during World War II.

sen.j: 現在、琵琶湖疏水分線の水を使った親水公園を中央分離帯に建設中である。
sen.e: At present, the water park which uses water from divided line of Lake Biwa Canal is under construction.
At present, the water park which uses water divided from Lake Biwa Canal is under construction.
At present, the water park which uses water divided from Lake Biwa Canal is under construction.

sen.j: 水は堀川に流され、堀川の水流を復活させる予定である。
sen.e: The water goes into Horikawa, and it plans to revive the current of Horikawa.
The plan is to divert water to Horikawa, thereby reviving it.
The plan is to divert water to Horikawa, thereby reviving it.

Public transportation
Public Transportation

sen.j: 加茂街道と烏丸通の間には京都市営バスの路線がある。
sen.e: There is Kyoto City Bus line between Kamo kaido and Karasuma-dori Street.
A Kyoto City Bus line exists between Kamo kaido and Karasuma-dori Street.
A Kyoto City Bus line exists between Kamo kaido and Karasuma-dori Street.
